text:
The XML data below, when combined with the XSL data in versions .16, .17, .18 
produces a table whose last row is split over 2 pages.  I have added borders on 
the cells that are drawn to highlight the issue.

In version 0.20.1, the condition is resolved, but ONLY if the Fop application 
is run on an xml:fo file from disk (when called with the -xsl xslFile 
parameter, it produces an error message regarding only Table Rows are allowed 
children of Table, Table Header, or Table Footer).

Big files with lots of instructions, but it should work and it doesn't:

extent="{$regionBeforeExtent}{$pageUnits}"/>
					<fo:region-after 
extent="{$regionAfterExtent}{$pageUnits}"/>
<!--
				<fo:simple-page-master master-
name="simplePageMasterAll" margin-top="{$marginTop}{$pageUnits}" margin-
bottom="{$marginBottom}{$pageUnits}" margin-left="{$marginLeft}{$pageUnits}" 
margin-right="{$marginRight}{$pageUnits}" page-height="{$portraitPageHeight}
{$pageUnits}" page-width="{$portraitPageWidth}{$pageUnits}" background-
color="white">
					<fo:region-body margin-
top="{$regionBodyMarginTop}{$pageUnits}" margin-
bottom="{$regionBodyMarginBottom}{$pageUnits}"/>
					<fo:region-before 
extent="{$regionBeforeExtent}{$pageUnits}"/>
					<fo:region-after 
extent="{$regionAfterExtent}{$pageUnits}"/>
-->
				</fo:simple-page-master>
				<fo:page-sequence-master master-
name="pageSequenceMasterAll">
					<fo:repeatable-page-master-alternatives>
						<fo:conditional-page-master-
reference master-name="simplePageMasterAll"/>
					</fo:repeatable-page-master-
alternatives>
				</fo:page-sequence-master>
			</fo:layout-master-set>
			<fo:page-sequence master-name="pageSequenceMasterAll">
				<!-- set up a static header for all pages -->
				<fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-
before">
					<fo:block-container 
height="{$headerHeight}{$pageUnits}" position="absolute" top="0.0{$pageUnits}" 
left="0.0{$pageUnits}">
						<xsl:attribute 
name="width"><xsl:value-of select="$bodyWidth - 
$headerGraphicWidth"/><xsl:value-of select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
						<xsl:apply-templates 
select="header"/>
					</fo:block-container>
					<fo:block-container 
height="{$headerHeight}{$pageUnits}" width="{$headerGraphicWidth}{$pageUnits}" 
position="absolute" top="0.0{$pageUnits}">
						<xsl:attribute 
name="left"><xsl:value-of select="$bodyWidth - $headerGraphicWidth"/><xsl:value-
of select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
						<fo:block text-align-last="end">
							<fo:external-graphic 
src="file:./toddLogo.gif" width="{$headerGraphicWidth}{$pageUnits}" 
height="{$headerGraphicHeight}{$pageUnits}"/>
						</fo:block>
					</fo:block-container>
					<fo:block-container height="0.1
{$pageUnits}" width="{$bodyWidth}{$pageUnits}" position="absolute" 
top="{$headerHeight}{$pageUnits}" left="0.0{$pageUnits}">
						<xsl:call-template 
name="horizontalRule"/>
					</fo:block-container>
					<!-- if this is a summary report, print 
a summary header -->
					<xsl:if 
test="/toddTables/@summary='true'">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit1 !
= '00' ">
							<fo:block-container 
height="0.5{$pageUnits}" width="{$halfBodyWidth}{$pageUnits}" 
position="absolute" top="2.2{$pageUnits}" left="0.0{$pageUnits}">
								<fo:block line-
height="{$labelFontLineHeight}{$fontUnits}" text-align="center" font-
size="{$labelFontSize}{$fontUnits}" background-color="{$backgroundRed}">
								
	<xsl:text> = Von </xsl:text>
								
	<xsl:value-of select="/toddTables/markedLimit1/@value"/>
								
	<xsl:text> Teammitgliedern mit 1< markiert</xsl:text>
								</fo:block>
							</fo:block-container>
							<fo:block-container 
height="0.5{$pageUnits}" width="{$halfBodyWidth}{$pageUnits}" 
position="absolute" top="2.2{$pageUnits}" left="{$halfBodyWidth}{$pageUnits}">
								<fo:block line-
height="{$labelFontLineHeight}{$fontUnits}" text-align="center" font-
size="{$labelFontSize}{$fontUnits}" background-color="yellow">
								
	<xsl:text> = Von </xsl:text>
								
	<xsl:value-of select="/toddTables/markedLimit2/@value"/>
								
	<xsl:text> Teammitgliedern mit 1< markiert</xsl:text>
								</fo:block>
							</fo:block-container>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:if>
				</fo:static-content>
				<!-- set up a static footer for all pages-->
				<fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after">
					<fo:block-container 
height="{$regionAfterExtent}{$pageUnits}" width="{$bodyWidth}{$pageUnits}">
						<xsl:apply-templates 
select="footer"/>
					</fo:block-container>
				</fo:static-content>
				<!-- set up a the flow for all pages-->
				<fo:flow flow-name="xsl-region-body">
					<!-- match the sector tag and apply 
templates -->
            		<fo:block>
                        <xsl:apply-templates select="sector"/>
            		</fo:block>
				</fo:flow>
			</fo:page-sequence>
		</fo:root>
	</xsl:template>
	<!-- match the sector tag -->
	<xsl:template match="sector">
		<!-- set up a table with n columns -->
        <!-- find the factor tag and apply templates to fill the sector table-
body -->
			<fo:table width="{$bodyWidth}{$pageUnits}">
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="$numberPerPage = '4'">
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="$numberPerPage = '8'">
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:otherwise>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$sectorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
					</xsl:otherwise>
				</xsl:choose>
				<fo:table-body>
					<xsl:apply-templates select="factor"/>
				</fo:table-body>
			</fo:table>
			<fo:table width="{$bodyWidth}{$pageUnits}" space-
before.optimum="1pt" space-after.optimum="1pt">
				<fo:table-column>
					<xsl:attribute name="column-
width"><xsl:value-of select="$bodyWidth - (((6 + count
(secTotals/secFactors/factortitle)) * $secTotalsColumnWidth)+ 0.1)"/><xsl:value-
of select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
				</fo:table-column>
				<fo:table-column>
					<xsl:attribute name="column-
width"><xsl:value-of select="(((6 + count(secTotals/secFactors/factortitle)) * 
$secTotalsColumnWidth))+ 0.1"/><xsl:value-of 
select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
				</fo:table-column>
				<fo:table-body>
					<xsl:apply-templates 
select="secTotals"/>
				</fo:table-body>
			</fo:table>
 	</xsl:template>
	<!-- match the factor tag -->
	<xsl:template match="factor">
		<xsl:if test="position() mod $numberPerRow = 1 or $numberPerRow 
= 1">
			<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"><fo:table-
row></xsl:text>
		</xsl:if>
		<fo:table-cell border-color="black" border-width="1pt">
			<fo:block font-size="{$labelFontSize}{$fontUnits}">
				<xsl:apply-templates select="factortitle"/>
			</fo:block>
			<fo:block>
				<xsl:if test="not(/toddTables/@summary='true')">
					<fo:table width="{$bodyWidth}
{$pageUnits}">
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<xsl:for-each 
select="users/seqNr">
							<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						</xsl:for-each>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="0.1cm"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$statementColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-body font-
family="{$fontFamily}" font-weight="normal" font-size="{$factorFontSize}
{$fontUnits}" text-align="center" line-height="{$factorFontLineHeight}
{$fontUnits}">
							<fo:table-row>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>Item</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="users/seqNr"/>
								<fo:table-cell/>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>ToG</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>ToR</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@includeStmt='true' ">
										
	<xsl:text>Statement</xsl:text>
									
	</xsl:if>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
							</fo:table-row>
							<xsl:for-each 
select="item">
								<fo:table-row>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="itemId"/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="result"/>
								
	<fo:table-cell/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="SumW"/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="SumU"/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="statement"/>
								</fo:table-row>
							</xsl:for-each>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facSumW"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facSumU"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facAvgW"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facAvgSumPers"/>
						</fo:table-body>
					</fo:table>
				</xsl:if>
				<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@summary='true'">
					<fo:table width="{$bodyWidth}
{$pageUnits}">
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$factorColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$statementColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-body font-
family="{$fontFamily}" font-weight="normal" font-size="{$factorFontSize}
{$fontUnits}" text-align="center" line-height="{$factorFontLineHeight}
{$fontUnits}">
							<fo:table-row>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>Item</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>ToG</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>ToR</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@includeStmt='true' ">
										
	<xsl:text>Statement</xsl:text>
									
	</xsl:if>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
							</fo:table-row>
							<xsl:for-each 
select="item">
								<fo:table-row>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="itemId"/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="SumW"/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="SumU"/>
								
	<xsl:apply-templates select="statement"/>
								</fo:table-row>
							</xsl:for-each>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facSumW"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facSumU"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facAvgW"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facAvgSumPers"/>
						</fo:table-body>
					</fo:table>
				</xsl:if>
			</fo:block>
 		</fo:table-cell>
		<xsl:if test="$numberPerPage='16'">
			<xsl:if test="position() mod 4 = 0">
				<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes"></fo:table-row></xsl:text>
			</xsl:if>
			<xsl:if test="position() mod 4 = 1 and position() = last
()">
				<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes"><fo:table-cell/><fo:table-cell/><fo:table-
cell/></fo:table-row></xsl:text>
			</xsl:if>
			<xsl:if test="position() mod 4 = 2 and position() = last
()">
				<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes"><fo:table-cell/><fo:table-cell/></fo:table-
row></xsl:text>
			</xsl:if>
			<xsl:if test="position() mod 4 = 3 and position() = last
()">
				<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes"><fo:table-cell/></fo:table-row></xsl:text>
			</xsl:if>
		</xsl:if>
		<xsl:if test="$numberPerPage='8'">
			<xsl:if test="position() mod 2 = 0">
				<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes"></fo:table-row></xsl:text>
			</xsl:if>
			<xsl:if test="position() mod 2 = 1 and position() = last
()">
				<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes"><fo:table-cell/></fo:table-row></xsl:text>
			</xsl:if>
		</xsl:if>
		<xsl:if test="$numberPerPage='4'">
			<xsl:text disable-output-escaping="yes"></fo:table-
row></xsl:text>
		</xsl:if>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="secTotals">
		<fo:table-row>
			<fo:table-cell/>
			<fo:table-cell>
<!--
			<fo:table-cell number-columns-
spanned="{$numberColumnsSpanned}" border-color="black" border-width="1pt">
-->
				<fo:block>
					<fo:table width="{$bodyWidth}
{$pageUnits}">
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$secTotalsColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}" border-width="{$factorBorderWidth}
{$fontUnits}"/>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$secTotalsColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						<xsl:for-each 
select="secFactors/factortitle">
							<fo:table-column column-
width="{$secTotalsColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}"/>
						</xsl:for-each>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$secTotalsColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}">
							<xsl:text>Sum</xsl:text>
						</fo:table-column>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$secTotalsColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}">
						
	<xsl:text>DurF</xsl:text>
						</fo:table-column>
						<fo:table-column column-
width="{$secTotalsColumnWidth}{$pageUnits}">
						
	<xsl:text>DurB</xsl:text>
						</fo:table-column>
						<fo:table-body font-
family="{$fontFamily}" font-weight="normal" font-size="{$factorFontSize}
{$fontUnits}" text-align="center" line-height="{$factorFontLineHeight}
{$fontUnits}">
							<fo:table-row>
								<fo:table-cell 
padding="1{$fontUnits}">
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>Total</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secFactors/factortitle"/>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>Sum</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>DurF</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>DurB</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
							</fo:table-row>
							<fo:table-row>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secTitle"/>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>ToG</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumW/facTotW"/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumW/secTotW"/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumW/secAvgFacW"/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumW/secAvgPerW"/>
							</fo:table-row>
							<fo:table-row>
								<fo:table-cell/>
								<fo:table-cell>
								
	<fo:block>
									
	<xsl:text>ToR</xsl:text>
								
	</fo:block>
								</fo:table-cell>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumU/facTotU"/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumU/secTotU"/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumU/secAvgFacU"/>
								<xsl:apply-
templates select="secSumU/secAvgPerU"/>
							</fo:table-row>
						</fo:table-body>
					</fo:table>
				</fo:block>
			</fo:table-cell>
		</fo:table-row>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="factor/factortitle">
			<xsl:apply-templates/>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="itemId | facSumPersU | facAvgPersW | facAvgItemW | 
facAvgItemU | facAvgPerU | facAvgPerW | facAvgPersU | facAvgPersW | 
secFactors/factortitle | facTotW | facTotU">
		<fo:table-cell>
			<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@summary='true'">
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="../SumU >= 
$markedLimit1">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit1 !
= '00' ">
							<xsl:attribute 
name="background-color"><xsl:value-of select="$backgroundRed"/></xsl:attribute>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="../SumU >= 
$markedLimit2">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit2 !
= '00' ">
							<xsl:attribute 
name="background-color">yellow</xsl:attribute>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:when>
				</xsl:choose>
			</xsl:if>
			<fo:block>
				<xsl:apply-templates/>
			</fo:block>
		</fo:table-cell>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="result">
		<fo:table-cell border-width="{$factorBorderWidth}{$fontUnits}" 
border-color="gray">
			<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@summary='true'">
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="../SumU >= 
$markedLimit1">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit1 !
= '00' ">
							<xsl:attribute 
name="background-color"><xsl:value-of select="$backgroundRed"/></xsl:attribute>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="../SumU >= 
$markedLimit2">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit2 !
= '00' ">
							<xsl:attribute 
name="background-color">yellow</xsl:attribute>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:when>
				</xsl:choose>
			</xsl:if>
			<fo:block>
				<xsl:apply-templates/>
			</fo:block>
		</fo:table-cell>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="seqNr | SumW | SumU | facSumPersW | secTotW | 
secAvgFacW | secAvgPerW | secTotU | secAvgFacU | secAvgPerU">
		<fo:table-cell border-width="{$factorBorderWidth}{$fontUnits}">
			<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@summary='true'">
				<xsl:choose>
					<xsl:when test="../SumU >= 
$markedLimit1">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit1 !
= '00' ">
							<xsl:attribute 
name="background-color"><xsl:value-of select="$backgroundRed"/></xsl:attribute>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:when>
					<xsl:when test="../SumU >= 
$markedLimit2">
						<xsl:if test="$markedLimit2 !
= '00' ">
							<xsl:attribute 
name="background-color">yellow</xsl:attribute>
						</xsl:if>
					</xsl:when>
				</xsl:choose>
			</xsl:if>
			<fo:block>
				<xsl:apply-templates/>
			</fo:block>
		</fo:table-cell>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="statement">
		<xsl:choose>
			<xsl:when test="/toddTables/@includeStmt = 'true' ">
				<fo:table-cell border-
width="{$factorBorderWidth}{$fontUnits}" text-align="start">
					<fo:block wrap-option="no-wrap"  text-
indent="0.03{$pageUnits}">
						<xsl:text disable-output-
escaping="yes">       </xsl:text>
						<xsl:value-of select="substring
(.,0,$statementCharacterCount)"/>
					</fo:block>
				</fo:table-cell>
			</xsl:when>
			<xsl:otherwise>
				<fo:table-cell>
					<xsl:attribute name="width"><xsl:value-
of select="$sectorColumnWidth - (3 * $factorColumnWidth) - 0.1"/><xsl:value-of 
select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
					<fo:block text-align="start"/>
				</fo:table-cell>
			</xsl:otherwise>
		</xsl:choose>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="facSumW">
		<fo:table-row>
			<fo:table-cell>
				<fo:block>
					<xsl:text>ToG</xsl:text>
				</fo:block>
			</fo:table-cell>
			<xsl:choose>
				<xsl:when test="/toddTables/@summary='false' ">
					<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facSumPersW"/>
					<fo:table-cell/>
				</xsl:when>
			</xsl:choose>
			<xsl:apply-templates select="facSumTotPersW"/>
			<xsl:apply-templates select="facSumTotPersU"/>
			<fo:table-cell/>
		</fo:table-row>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="facSumU">
		<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@summary='false'">
			<fo:table-row>
				<fo:table-cell>
					<fo:block>
						<xsl:text>ToR</xsl:text>
					</fo:block>
				</fo:table-cell>
				<xsl:apply-templates select="facSumPersU"/>
				<fo:table-cell/>
				<fo:table-cell/>
				<fo:table-cell/>
				<fo:table-cell/>
			</fo:table-row>
		</xsl:if>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="facAvgW">
		<fo:table-row>
			<fo:table-cell>
				<fo:block>
					<xsl:text>Dur/I</xsl:text>
				</fo:block>
			</fo:table-cell>
			<xsl:choose>
				<xsl:when test="/toddTables/@summary='false' ">
					<xsl:apply-templates 
select="facAvgPersW"/>
					<fo:table-cell/>
				</xsl:when>
			</xsl:choose>
			<xsl:apply-templates select="facAvgItemW"/>
			<xsl:apply-templates select="facAvgItemU"/>
			<fo:table-cell/>
		</fo:table-row>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="facAvgSumPers">
		<fo:table-row>
			<fo:table-cell>
				<fo:block>
					<xsl:text>Dur/P</xsl:text>
				</fo:block>
			</fo:table-cell>
			<xsl:if test="/toddTables/@summary='false'">
				<fo:table-cell/>
				<xsl:for-each select="../users/seqNr">
					<fo:table-cell/>
				</xsl:for-each>
			</xsl:if>
			<xsl:apply-templates select="facAvgPerW"/>
			<xsl:apply-templates select="facAvgPerU"/>
			<fo:table-cell/>
		</fo:table-row>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="facSumTotPersU | facSumTotPersW">
		<fo:table-cell border-width="{$factorBorderWidth}{$fontUnits}">
			<fo:block>
				<xsl:apply-templates/>
			</fo:block>
		</fo:table-cell>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="secTitle">
		<fo:table-cell font-weight="bold">
			<fo:block>
				<xsl:apply-templates/>
			</fo:block>
		</fo:table-cell>
	</xsl:template>
	<!-- FROM HERE ON DOWN IS WHERE FONTS AND TEXT AND OTHER STUFF IS 
TRANSFORMED -->
	<xsl:template match="header">
		<xsl:apply-templates select="line1"/>
		<xsl:apply-templates select="line2"/>
		<xsl:apply-templates select="line3"/>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="line1">
		<fo:block line-height="25{$fontUnits}" font-size="22
{$fontUnits}" font-weight="bold">
			<xsl:apply-templates/>
		</fo:block>
	</xsl:template>
	<xsl:template match="line2 | line3">
		<fo:block line-height="15{$fontUnits}" font-size="13
{$fontUnits}" font-weight="normal">
			<xsl:apply-templates/>
		</fo:block>
	</xsl:template>
	<!-- substitute fo stuff for footer stuff -->
	<xsl:template match="footer">
		<xsl:call-template name="horizontalRule"/>
		<fo:block text-align-last="center" font-size="6{$fontUnits}" 
line-height="8{$fontUnits}">
			<fo:table>
				<fo:table-column>
					<xsl:attribute name="column-
width"><xsl:value-of select="$bodyWidth div 2"/><xsl:value-of 
select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
				</fo:table-column>
				<fo:table-column>
					<xsl:attribute name="column-
width"><xsl:value-of select="$bodyWidth div 2"/><xsl:value-of 
select="$pageUnits"/></xsl:attribute>
				</fo:table-column>
				<fo:table-body>
					<fo:table-row>
						<fo:table-cell>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="left/line1"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="left/line2"/>
						</fo:table-cell>
						<fo:table-cell>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="right/line1"/>
							<xsl:apply-templates 
select="right/line2"/>
						</fo:table-cell>
					</fo:table-row>
				</fo:table-body>
			</fo:table>
			<fo:page-number/>
		</fo:block>
	</xsl:template>
	<!-- substitute fo stuff for left footer stuff -->
	<xsl:template match="left/line1 | left/line2">
		<fo:block text-align="start">
			<xsl:apply-templates/>
		</fo:block>
	</xsl:template>
	<!-- substitute fo stuff for right footer stuff -->
	<xsl:template match="right/line1 | right/line2">
		<fo:block text-align="end">
			<xsl:apply-templates/>
		</fo:block>
	</xsl:template>
	<!--HACK FOR HR -->
	<xsl:template name="horizontalRule">
		<fo:block>
			<fo:table width="{$bodyWidth }{$pageUnits}" height="0.5
{$fontUnits}">
				<fo:table-column column-width="{$bodyWidth }
{$pageUnits}" border-width="0.5{$fontUnits}"/>
				<fo:table-body>
					<fo:table-row>
						<fo:table-cell/>
					</fo:table-row>
				</fo:table-body>
			</fo:table>
		</fo:block>
	</xsl:template>
</xsl:stylesheet>

text:
Don't use disable-output-escaping in transformations whose result is not
serialized, as it happens if the transformation is called from the FOP
driver. Consult a book or the XSL list archive for reasons.
